oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bible belonging to Abraham Zinn Long
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Family Bible belonging to Abraham Zinn Long. Bible features notes on a few pages made by family members as well as documentation on births through 1891. The "Births" page records the births of Abraham Zinn and Eliza Long and five of their children-- Nellie, Dora, James, Chauncey and William Emory, all in Ohio.
